name: Out of order (Etyen, GiGiChef, Ravengar)
description:
Description

Once trapped in the elevator, how can you be sure to get out ?  In that game doors will not be open easily and you will have to face enigmas to escape this infernal descent.

this game was made for the ludum dare 48

Controls

ZQSD/WASD to move

Left click to interact

Right click to cancel/drope

Credits

Etyen

Ravengar

GiGiChef
